title: Arachne - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Shoujo Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Humanoid Protagonist   Loli   Overpowered Protagonist   Reincarnated as a Monster   Reincarnated in Another World   Sword And Magic

description:
A woman is reincarnated as a newborn Arachne. Unable to stay among her own kind, she sets out to live disguised as a human tailor.
